title: Delaware Water Gap National Recreation Area: Freedom Of Information Act
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management     Freedom Of Information Act              Freedom of Information Act (FOIA)         Excerpt from Henry Mosler's painting "The Birth of the Flag", 1777.    Department of Interior FOIA regulations, instructions, and general information can be found on the Department of the Interior's FOIA page.   NPS Uses Multi-track Processing of FOIA Requests- In accordance with 43 CFR 2.15, the NPS uses four processing tracks based on the amount of time required for a request to be processed: Simple, 1-5 workdays; Normal, 20 workdays; Complex, over 20 workdays; and Exceptional / Voluminous which will take over 60 workdays to process. When using the online form, if you do not receive an acknowledgment of your request from the NPS within 48-72 hours, please contact your regional NPS FOIA Officer. For more information visit the following web pages.     NPS FOIA Library - current and completed FOIA Materials.   NPS FOIA Officers and Contacts  - list of officers by region DOI FOIA Request Form - you can download a FOIA request form
